scripts.dev: concurrently --names "front,back,ai,mongo, admin" --prefix-colors "cyan,green,magenta,yellow,blue" "npm run front-client" "npm run back" "npm run ai-server" "npm run mongod" "npm run admin "
scripts.server: concurrently --names "back,ai,mongo,admin" --prefix-colors "green,magenta,yellow,blue" "npm run back" "npm run ai-server" "npm run mongod" "npm run admin"
